title: Planning the Day's Work
text: Pasture rotation story. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. We record yields and monitor feed intake. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market.
